article_hero.title: Trinity, a Mainson emblem and jewelery icon
article_hero.dek: Created in 1924 by Louis Cartier, the Trinity ring soon became one of the emblems of the Maison and a jewelery icon.

items.content: First ring made of three interlaced individual bands. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
